const botTypeClasses = { Assault: "icon military", Defender: "icon shield", Support: "icon plus circle", Medic: "icon ambulance", Witch: "icon magic", Captain: "icon star" } const BotCard = props => { const { bot, action, removeCard } = props function handleClick(e) { console.log("handleClick fired!") action(bot) } function handleDischarge(e) { console.log("Red X Clicked!") e.stopPropagation() removeCard(bot) } return (
{props.bot.name}
{props.bot.catchphrase}
{props.bot.health} {props.bot.damage} {props.bot.armor}
) } export default BotCard; Card;
